name: addAnimation()
description: Add an animation to the sprite. The animation can either be multiple images or parts of a spritesheet.
syntax: .addAnimation(name, path, frames, width, height, int row)

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: A pattern for finding images representing the frames.

parameters.name: frames
parameters.description: The number of frames for this animation.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of one frame. Only needed when loading from a spritesheet.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of one frame. Only needed when loading from a spritesheet.

parameters.name: row
parameters.description: The row in a spritesheet. Only needed when loading from a spritesheet.
